simplifiedChinese.title: Tried, Crucified & Risen
simplifiedChinese.Question1: Imagine yourself in the story, observing first hand the crucifixion and resurrection of Jesus. With which character do you most identify? Why?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Note the different individual and groups that encountered the risen Jesus. How did each respond?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: When Jesus appeared to his disciples what did he do and say to them?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: How has Jesus' final command made a difference in your life? How should it?
